thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Dawn

author: Dawn
title: Dawn
text: My experience with Flight Hub in the past 10 year's has been" AMAZING" to say the least. I ALWAY'S book them for my domestic flights. The flights are always on time with departure & arrival times. As I have meetings shortly after arriving, and typically 2 hours before I depart from airport. It is impairative that my schedule remain's on time. They are very professional, precise with fast bookings, always provide best prices, great flight times. Truly I could'nt run my buisness with out your services. You make flying Enjoyable & Relaxing!! Thanks a million Flight Hub!!! Respectfully, Dawn. Miller
